Changelog
---------

Here you can see the full list of changes between each SQLAlchemy-Fixtures release.


0.1.2 (2012-12-10)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Fixed new() relationship handling



0.1.1 (2012-12-10)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Added support for lazy evaluated properties



0.1.0 (2012-11-21)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Initial public release
